page.title: 09PLAYGROUND GAMES 1 DOUNE
page.content: { DELTA "Someone is chosen to be hit. Then you choose the number you will count up to. The person who is hit will count up to that number while the others hide. When they have finished counting they look for the others. If those who were hiding all get Delta Free-all. Then the person who was hit has to be hit again. If the person who is hit catches anybody by saying Delta 1-2-3 then the first person caught is hit next time." KIRSTEN { TIG "In this game one person goes it and the others run around. The person who is it chases the others. If he catches anyone he says "TIG". The person caught becomes "IT". There is also a den where anyone not it can go and be safe." FRASER
